content:
what do you see is what you get.

all editors suck.

Proposing a new way of thinking in web editors.

– All JavaScript has to be on the webpage
– no remote procedure calls, no PHP, wasm is ok
– everything that is needed to run to the page should be available off-line

And has the nice trade-off that there are a lot of components already available. This means that you don’t have to build your own gallery components or sliders. Basically do not have to reinvent the wheel.

text re-presentation in ...
title: All website editors suck
author: duncankolba
description: Proposing a new way of thinking in web editors
headline: A good editor is hard to build
subline: From wysiwyg to wysiwym and beyond
